comments.body: Perhaps add a $ at the end to match the ^ at the beginning?
I left it off on purpose, so it'd still match something like '1.2.3-foo', in case we ever came across that.
Null safety guide says don't return null from factories.  Convert to a static method instead per https://dart.dev/null-safety/faq#how-should-i-migrate-a-factory-that-can-return-null
